titleStmt.title: A catalogue of the nobility of England, according to their respective precedencies as it was presented to His Majesty by John Dugdale, Esq. ... on New-years-day, 1684 ... ; to which is added the blazon of their paternal coats of arms respectively, and a list of the present bishops.
titleStmt.author: Dugdale, John.

notesStmt.note: "Jan. 21. 1684. I do order and appoint that his list be printed; and that none other be printed without my allowance. Norfolk and Marshal."
This work appears as Wing D2471 on reel 141 and as Wing C1406 on reel 1664.
Entry for C1406 cancelled in Wing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of originals in the British Library and the Bodleian Library.
